title: Apple Is Trying to Kill the Open Internet!
description:
Apple is trying to kill the open internet by banning web apps (PWAs) in the EU! This has come unexpectedly with 0 notice in the iOS 17.4 development beta and has negative implications for the internet as a whole. Here's why we need to speak up and take action! Help stop this before it spreads to other areas around the world.

Open Web Advocacy: https://open-web-advocacy.org/
Open Web Advocacy Blog Post: https://open-web-advocacy.org/blog/its-official-apple-kills-web-apps-in-the-eu/
EU DMA, First Dropdown: https://digital-markets-act.ec.europa.eu/about-dma/questions-and-answers_en#:~:text=How%20to%20get%20in%20touch,%40ec.europa.eu
Chromium Site Isolation: https://www.chromium.org/Home/chromium-security/site-isolation/

🔐 Our Website: https://techlore.tech
🕵 Go Incognito Course - to learn about privacy: https://techlore.tech/goincognito
🏫 Techlore Coaching - to get direct support: https://techlore.tech/coaching
💻 Techlore Forum - to connect with other advocates: https://discus
